title: Alex just called Musk a ‘sensible transhumanist’ – EXACTLY the sales-pitch I have been exposing that allows Musk to sell human/AI fusion to those who were formerly WARNING about the transhumanist agenda. This is nothing if not predictable to anyone paying attention
text:
It’s all a Vaudeville show, a pantomime ready for Christmas. Will Trump and Musk be the heroes who pull it off right at the ‘brink’? Will they save the world and be launched into mega-stardom so the agenda they both represent for their masters becomes so much easier to sell? Or will the brinkmanship go on? Oh, the drama.
The key to understanding current events – ALL events – is to know that those controlling the Biden/Starmer regimes allowing weapons to be used inside Russia are the same force controlling Musk and Trump to ‘save the world from nuclear Armageddon’. It’s a show, people, perceptual manipulation theatre and the mainstream fake ‘alternative’ media is its propaganda arm.
Global Exclusive: Trump/Elon Musk Are Working Behind The Scenes To Broker A Ukraine-Russia Ceasefire & Major Peace Deal! Meanwhile, The Desperate Globalists Are Doing Everything They Can To Escalate The Conflict Into Full World War! Must-Watch/Share https://t.co/Rpfnaka5xx
— Alex Jones (@RealAlexJones) November 21, 2024
